# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Supply Arrangement (RSA) IDFA S-001

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking experienced and qualified Independent Digital Forensic Analysts (IDFAs) to assist on CRA matters as required. This work may involve searching and extracting data during the execution of search warrants or from seized electronic document systems (EDS), forensic images, and other digital forensic work.

## Background

The CRA will award Supply Arrangements (SAs) and establish a List of Prequalified Consultants (LPC) to facilitate the procurement of independent digital forensic services for the Criminal Investigation Division (CID) of the CRA across four regions: Atlantic, Quebec, Ontario, and Western.

## Objectives

* To engage experienced and qualified IDFAs to provide independent digital forensic services to the CID of the CRA
* To establish a List of Prequalified Consultants (LPC) to facilitate the procurement of independent digital forensic services

## Evaluation Criteria

Respondents must meet the following mandatory requirements:

* Experience in performing digital forensic analysis
* Education and background
* Forensic software, hardware, and tools
* Secure physical premises in Canada for storing and analyzing evidence
* Language requirements

## Submissions

Bidders must submit proposals in either English or French, and may propose for one or more regions. The submission deadline is November 30, 2025, at 14:00 EST.
